title: Sett dissapeared from my champion pool
body:
He is nowhere to be found. I search him up and nothing. I own all champions. He also isn't available at the store and i cannot ban him either. Acquired him with Sett's Calling Card. 

Edit: He doesn't appear to be listed in any role that i click, but if i highlight him pre-bans i can see him there.

replies.body: I'm the attorney for {{champion:875}} . My client has informed me that he has filed a restraining order against you. You are not to go near him, pick him, or even ban him.
The role filters are based on what role that champion has been picked for lately. New champs don't have any data yet.
So once i select one of the roles how to i make it go back to show all champs
